textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer At the launch of her clothing line, Susana Monaco revolutionized the women's fashion world with her comfy supplex fabrics and hip designs. Today, the revolution continues as the designs continue to grow with the changing styles. Comfort and style are constants in the designer's work, as the looks can be taken from a jeans and flip-flops kind of day to a night on the town. From flowing to fitted, solid to patterns, Susana Monaco just fits.
